block.p: O'CONNELL-Daniel. On July 17, 2000. Retired Metal Lathers Local 46. Devoted husband of Helen (nee Barry). Beloved father of Barry and Patrick. Cherished grandfather of Timothy Sean and Kathleen Meghan. Friends may call at the Andrett Funeral Home, 353 2nd Ave (at 20th St) NYC Wednesday, 2-5 and 7-9 PM. Mass of Christian burial at Immaculate Conception Church, Thursday, 11 AM. Interment Gate of Heaven Cemetery.
